com.zookitec.layout
Class GroupEF

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.zookitec.layout.GroupEF
public class GroupEF
extends java.lang.Object

An expression factory used to create expressions that depend on attributes of a group of components.

Method Summary
static Expression bottom(java.awt.Component[] group)
          Creates an expression for the bottom coordinate of the component group; this is the maximum bottom y coordinate of all components in the group.

public static Expression height(java.awt.Component[] group)
Creates an expession for the height of the component group. This is the bottom coordinate of the group minus the top y coordinate of the group.

width

public static Expression width(java.awt.Component[] group)
Create an expession for the width of the component group. This is the rightmost component right x coordinate minus the leftmost component left x coordinate.
